SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk

Class ExtensionsRunner

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.sdk.ExtensionsRunner
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtensionsRunnerForTest
public class ExtensionsRunner extends Object
The primary class to run an extension.

During instantiation, this class reads extension points from the extension based on its implemented interfaces and registers necessary information with the ExtensionsManager or other OpenSearch classes.

Extensions initialize by passing an instance of themselves to the run(Extension) method.

    • getCustomNamedWriteables

      public List<org.opensearch.common.io.stream.NamedWriteableRegistry.Entry> getCustomNamedWriteables()

      Returns:
      A list of NamedWriteableRegistry.Entry objects representing custom named writeable registry entries.

    • sendEnvironmentSettingsRequest

      Returns:

    • sendAddSettingsUpdateConsumerRequest

      public void sendAddSettingsUpdateConsumerRequest(org.opensearch.transport.TransportService transportService, Map<org.opensearch.common.settings.Setting<?>,Consumer<?>> settingUpdateConsumers)
      Registers settings and setting consumers with the UpdateSettingsRequestHandler and then sends a request to OpenSearch to register these Setting objects with a callback to this extension. The result will be handled by a AcknowledgedResponseHandler.
      Parameters:
      transportService - The TransportService defining the connection to OpenSearch.
      settingUpdateConsumers - A map of setting objects and their corresponding consumers
